verses.verse: לֵ֣ץ <S%H3887><s%> [is] a mocker הַ֭יַּין <S%H3196><s%> Wine הֹמֶ֣ה <S%H1993><s%> [is] raging שֵׁכָ֑ר <S%H7941><s%> strong drink וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and whoever שֹׁ֥גֶה <S%H7686><s%> and whosoever is deceived בּ֝֗וֹ לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> is not יֶחְכָּֽם׃ <S%H2449><s%> thereby is not wise

נַ֣הַם <S%H5099><s%> [is] as the roaring כַּ֭כְּפִיר <S%H3715><s%> of a lion אֵ֣ימַת <S%H367><s%> The fear מֶ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of a king מִ֝תְעַבְּר֗וֹ <S%H5674><s%> [whoso] provoketh him to anger חוֹטֵ֥א <S%H2398><s%> sinneth נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H5315><s%> [against] his own soul

כָּב֣וֹד <S%H3519><s%> [It is] an honour לָ֭אִישׁ <S%H376><s%> for a man שֶׁ֣בֶת <S%H7674><s%> to cease מֵרִ֑יב <S%H7379><s%> from strife וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any אֱ֝וִ֗יל <S%H191><s%> but every fool יִתְגַּלָּֽע׃ <S%H1566><s%> will be meddling

מֵ֭חֹרֶף <S%H2779><s%> by reason of the cold עָצֵ֣ל <S%H6102><s%> The sluggard לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not יַחֲרֹ֑שׁ <S%H2790><s%> will not plow [יִשְׁאַל כ] (וְשָׁאַ֖ל <S%H7592><s%> ask counsel ק) בַּקָּצִ֣יר <S%H7105><s%> in harvest וָאָֽיִן׃ <S%H369><s%> and has

מַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> water עֲ֭מֻקִּים <S%H6013><s%> [is like] deep עֵצָ֣ה <S%H6098><s%> Counsel בְלֶב־ <S%H3820><s%> in the heart אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of man וְאִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> but a man תְּבוּנָ֣ה <S%H8394><s%> of understanding יִדְלֶֽנָּה׃ <S%H1802><s%> will draw it out

רָב־ <S%H7230><s%> Most אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> men יִ֭קְרָא <S%H7121><s%> will proclaim אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one חַסְדּ֑וֹ <S%H2617><s%> his own goodness וְאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man אֱ֝מוּנִ֗ים <S%H529><s%> but a faithful מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> who יִמְצָֽא׃ <S%H4672><s%> who can find

מִתְהַלֵּ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> [man] walketh בְּתֻמּ֣וֹ <S%H8537><s%> in his integrity צַדִּ֑יק <S%H6662><s%> The just אַשְׁרֵ֖י <S%H835><s%> [are] blessed בָנָ֣יו <S%H1121><s%> his children אַחֲרָֽיו׃ <S%H310><s%> after

מֶ֗לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> A king יוֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> that sitteth in עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כִּסֵּא־ <S%H3678><s%> the throne דִ֑ין <S%H1779><s%> of judgment מְזָרֶ֖ה <S%H2219><s%> scattereth away בְעֵינָ֣יו <S%H5869><s%> with his eyes כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all רָֽע׃ <S%H7451><s%> all evil
מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who יֹ֭אמַר <S%H559><s%> Who can say זִכִּ֣יתִי <S%H2135><s%> clean לִבִּ֑י <S%H3820><s%> I have made my heart טָ֝הַ֗רְתִּי <S%H2891><s%> I am pure מֵחַטָּאתִֽי׃ <S%H2403><s%> sin

אֶ֣בֶן <S%H68><s%> Differing וָ֭אֶבֶן <S%H68><s%> weights אֵיפָ֣ה <S%H374><s%> and differing וְאֵיפָ֑ה <S%H374><s%> measures תּוֹעֲבַ֥ת <S%H8441><s%> abomination יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> of them [are] alike שְׁנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H8147><s%> both

גַּ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> again בְּ֭מַעֲלָלָיו <S%H4611><s%> by his doings יִתְנַכֶּר־ <S%H5234><s%> is known נָ֑עַר <S%H5288><s%> Even a child אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If זַ֖ךְ <S%H2134><s%> [be] pure וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> If יָשָׁ֣ר <S%H3477><s%> and whether [it be] right פָּעֳלֽוֹ׃ <S%H6467><s%> whether his work

אֹ֣זֶן <S%H241><s%> ear שֹׁ֭מַעַת <S%H8085><s%> The hearing וְעַ֣יִן <S%H5869><s%> eye רֹאָ֑ה <S%H7200><s%> and the seeing יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> hath made גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> even שְׁנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H8147><s%> even both

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֶּֽאֱהַ֣ב <S%H157><s%> Love שֵׁ֭נָה <S%H8142><s%> not sleep פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> or תִּוָּרֵ֑שׁ <S%H3423><s%> lest thou come to poverty פְּקַ֖ח <S%H6491><s%> open עֵינֶ֣יךָ <S%H5869><s%> thine eyes שְֽׂבַֽע־ <S%H7646><s%> [and] thou shalt be satisfied לָֽחֶם׃ <S%H3899><s%> with bread

רַ֣ע <S%H7451><s%> [It is] naught רַ֭ע <S%H7451><s%> [it is] naught יֹאמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> saith הַקּוֹנֶ֑ה <S%H7069><s%> the buyer וְאֹזֵ֥ל <S%H235><s%> but when he is gone ל֝֗וֹ אָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> then יִתְהַלָּֽל׃ <S%H1984><s%> his way then he boasteth

יֵ֣שׁ <S%H3426><s%> There is זָ֭הָב <S%H2091><s%> gold וְרָב־ <S%H7230><s%> and a multitude פְּנִינִ֑ים <S%H6443><s%> of rubies וּכְלִ֥י <S%H3627><s%> jewel יְ֝קָ֗ר <S%H3366><s%> [are] a precious שִׂפְתֵי־ <S%H8193><s%> but the lips דָֽעַת׃ <S%H1847><s%> of knowledge

לְֽקַח־ <S%H3947><s%> Take בִּ֭גְדוֹ <S%H899><s%> his garment כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> when עָ֣רַב <S%H6148><s%> that is surety זָ֑ר <S%H2114><s%> [for] a stranger וּבְעַ֖ד <S%H1157><s%> about [נָכְרִים כ] (נָכְרִיָּ֣ה <S%H5237><s%> alien ק) חַבְלֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H2254><s%> and take a pledge

עָרֵ֣ב <S%H6149><s%> be pleasant לָ֭אִישׁ <S%H376><s%> to a man לֶ֣חֶם <S%H3899><s%> Bread שָׁ֑קֶר <S%H8267><s%> of deceit וְ֝אַחַ֗ר <S%H310><s%> but afterwards יִמָּֽלֵא־ <S%H4390><s%> shall be filled פִ֥יהוּ <S%H6310><s%> his mouth חָצָֽץ׃ <S%H2687><s%> with gravel

מַ֭חֲשָׁבוֹת <S%H4284><s%> [Every] purpose בְּעֵצָ֣ה <S%H6098><s%> by counsel תִכּ֑וֹן <S%H3559><s%> is established וּ֝בְתַחְבֻּל֗וֹת <S%H8458><s%> and with good advice עֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> make מִלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> war

גּֽוֹלֶה־ <S%H1540><s%> revealeth סּ֭וֹד <S%H5475><s%> secrets הוֹלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> He that goeth about רָכִ֑יל <S%H7400><s%> [as] a talebearer וּלְפֹתֶ֥ה <S%H6601><s%> not with him that flattereth שְׂ֝פָתָ֗יו <S%H8193><s%> with his lips לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תִתְעָרָֽב׃ <S%H6148><s%> therefore meddle

מְ֭קַלֵּל <S%H7043><s%> Whoso curseth אָבִ֣יו <S%H1><s%> his father וְאִמּ֑וֹ <S%H517><s%> or his mother יִֽדְעַ֥ךְ <S%H1846><s%> shall be put out נֵ֝ר֗וֹ <S%H5216><s%> his lamp [בְּאִישֹׁון כ] (בֶּאֱשׁ֥וּן <S%H380><s%> apple ק) חֹֽשֶׁךְ׃ <S%H2822><s%> darkness

נַ֭חֲלָה <S%H5159><s%> An inheritance [מְבֻחֶלֶת כ] (מְבֹהֶ֣לֶת <S%H973><s%> abhor ק) בָּרִאשֹׁנָ֑ה <S%H7223><s%> at the beginning וְ֝אַחֲרִיתָ֗הּ <S%H319><s%> but the end לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not תְבֹרָֽךְ׃ <S%H1288><s%> thereof shall not be blessed

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֹּאמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> Say אֲשַׁלְּמָה־ <S%H7999><s%> not thou I will recompense רָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> evil קַוֵּ֥ה <S%H6960><s%> [but] wait on לַֽ֝יהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְיֹ֣שַֽׁע <S%H3467><s%> and he shall save לָֽךְ׃

תּוֹעֲבַ֣ת <S%H8441><s%> [are] an abomination יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֶ֣בֶן <S%H68><s%> Differing וָאָ֑בֶן <S%H68><s%> weights וּמֹאזְנֵ֖י <S%H3976><s%> balance מִרְמָ֣ה <S%H4820><s%> and a false לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> is not טֽוֹב׃ <S%H2896><s%> [is] not good

מֵיְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> [are] of the LORD מִצְעֲדֵי־ <S%H4703><s%> goings גָ֑בֶר <S%H1397><s%> Man's וְ֝אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> how can a man מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> How יָּבִ֥ין <S%H995><s%> then understand דַּרְכּֽוֹ׃ <S%H1870><s%> is a

מוֹקֵ֣שׁ <S%H4170><s%> [It is] a snare אָ֭דָם <S%H120><s%> to the man יָ֣לַע <S%H3216><s%> [who] devoureth קֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> [that which is] holy וְאַחַ֖ר <S%H310><s%> and after נְדָרִ֣ים <S%H5088><s%> vows לְבַקֵּֽר׃ <S%H1239><s%> to make enquiry

מְזָרֶ֣ה <S%H2219><s%> scattereth רְ֭שָׁעִים <S%H7563><s%> the wicked מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king חָכָ֑ם <S%H2450><s%> A wise וַיָּ֖שֶׁב <S%H7725><s%> and bringeth עֲלֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H5921><s%> over אוֹפָֽן׃ <S%H212><s%> the wheel

נֵ֣ר <S%H5216><s%> [is] the candle יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD נִשְׁמַ֣ת <S%H5397><s%> The spirit אָדָ֑ם <S%H120><s%> of man חֹ֝פֵ֗שׂ <S%H2664><s%> searching כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all חַדְרֵי־ <S%H2315><s%> all the inward parts בָֽטֶן׃ <S%H990><s%> of the belly

חֶ֣סֶד <S%H2617><s%> Mercy וֶ֭אֱמֶת <S%H571><s%> and truth יִצְּרוּ־ <S%H5341><s%> preserve מֶ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king וְסָעַ֖ד <S%H5582><s%> is upholden בַּחֶ֣סֶד <S%H2617><s%> by mercy כִּסְאֽוֹ׃ <S%H3678><s%> and his throne

תִּפְאֶ֣רֶת <S%H8597><s%> The glory בַּחוּרִ֣ים <S%H970><s%> of young men כֹּחָ֑ם <S%H3581><s%> [is] their strength וַהֲדַ֖ר <S%H1926><s%> and the beauty זְקֵנִ֣ים <S%H2205><s%> of old men שֵׂיבָֽה׃ <S%H7872><s%> [is] the gray head

חַבֻּר֣וֹת <S%H2250><s%> The blueness פֶּ֭צַע <S%H6482><s%> of a wound [תַּמְרִיק כ] (תַּמְר֣וּק <S%H4838><s%> bright ק) בְּרָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> away evil וּ֝מַכּ֗וֹת <S%H4347><s%> so [do] stripes חַדְרֵי־ <S%H2315><s%> the inward parts בָֽטֶן׃ <S%H990><s%> of the belly
